ReportSpec.Name: Revenue By Appeal Category Code Forcast Report
ReportSpec.Description: A report showing information about revenue by appeal category code forcast records
ReportSpec.Author: Abel C. Debela

DataRetrieval.CreateSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_REPORT_REVENUEBYAPPEALCATEGORYCODEFORCAST ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null )
as
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#FORECASTLIST') IS NOT NULL BEGIN DROP TABLE #FORECASTLIST END SELECT * INTO #FORECASTLIST FROM ( SELECT RF.APPEALCATEGORYCODEID ,ACC.DESCRIPTION as APPEALCATEGORYCODEDISPLAY ,case RF.MONTHID when 1 then 'MONTHJAN' when 2 then 'MONTHFEB' when 3 then 'MONTHMAR' when 4 then 'MONTHAPR' when 5 then 'MONTHMAY' when 6 then 'MONTHJUN' when 7 then 'MONTHJUL' when 8 then 'MONTHAUG' when 9 then 'MONTHSEP' when 10 then 'MONTHOCT' when 11 then 'MONTHNOV' when 12 then 'MONTHDEC' else 'MONTHUNKNOWN' end as MONTHNM ,RF.EXPECTEDTOTALGIFTAMOUNT as EXPECTEDTOTALGIFTAMOUNT FROM dbo.USR_REVENUECATEGORYBYAPPEALCODEFORECAST RF INNER JOIN dbo.GLFISCALYEAR FY ON RF.GLFISCALYEARID = FY.ID INNER JOIN APPEALCATEGORYCODE ACC ON RF.APPEALCATEGORYCODEID = ACC.ID WHERE FY.ID = @ID
) as SRC PIVOT ( SUM(EXPECTEDTOTALGIFTAMOUNT) FOR MONTHNM IN ([MONTHJAN], [MONTHFEB], [MONTHMAR], [MONTHAPR], [MONTHMAY], [MONTHJUN], [MONTHJUL], [MONTHAUG], [MONTHSEP], [MONTHOCT], [MONTHNOV], [MONTHDEC]) ) as DILI
--SELECT * FROM #FORECASTLIST ORDER BY APPEALCATEGORYCODEDISPLAY
--select * from #FORECASTLIST F
select * ,MONTHJAN * (Round(RAND(CAST( NEWID() AS varbinary ))*100,2)/100) as ACTUALJAN ,MONTHFEB * (Round(RAND(CAST( NEWID() AS varbinary ))*100,2)/100) as ACTUALFEB ,MONTHMAR * (Round(RAND(CAST( NEWID() AS varbinary ))*100,2)/100) as ACTUALMAR ,MONTHAPR * (Round(RAND(CAST( NEWID() AS varbinary ))*100,2)/100) as ACTUALAPR ,MONTHMAY * (Round(RAND(CAST( NEWID() AS varbinary ))*100,2)/100) as ACTUALMAY ,MONTHJUN * (Round(RAND(CAST( NEWID() AS varbinary ))*100,2)/100) as ACTUALJUN ,MONTHJUL * (Round(RAND(CAST( NEWID() AS varbinary ))*100,2)/100) as ACTUALJUL ,MONTHAUG * (Round(RAND(CAST( NEWID() AS varbinary ))*100,2)/100) as ACTUALAUG ,MONTHSEP * (Round(RAND(CAST( NEWID() AS varbinary ))*100,2)/100) as ACTUALSEP ,MONTHOCT * (Round(RAND(CAST( NEWID() AS varbinary ))*100,2)/100) as ACTUALOCT ,MONTHNOV * (Round(RAND(CAST( NEWID() AS varbinary ))*100,2)/100) as ACTUALNOV ,MONTHDEC * (Round(RAND(CAST( NEWID() AS varbinary ))*100,2)/100) as ACTUALDEC ,0 as ORDERRAW from #FORECASTLIST F
